segments.text: This kitchen is a total mess, disgusting really.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water everywhere from that stupid overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's just standing in it, not even noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron's probably getting soaked through.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those dirty dishes stacked up beside her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids making it worse with their climbing stunt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's hand in the cookie jar, crumbs everywhere no doubt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool's unstable, could crash and break something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl reaching up, like it's all a game.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor's slippery now, what a hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside garden looks clean, why can't inside be like that?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Whole place needs a good cleanup urgently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such carelessness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Ugh, turn off that faucet already.
segments.speaker: PAR
